searchSql.baseSql:
select tt.groupName,tt.groupParentID,tt.groupParentName,tt.name,tt.pkid, tt.caseCode,tt.instCode,tt.createTime,tt.candidateId,tt.taskId, tt.taskDfKey_OLD,tt.caseId,tt.propertyAddr,tt.CTM_CODE,tt.WFE_NAME,tt.AGENT_NAME,tt.AGENT_PHONE,tt.GRP_NAME from ( SELECT org.org_name groupName,org.parent_id as groupParentID, (SELECT org_parent.org_name FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG org_parent WHERE org_parent.id=org.parent_id) groupParentName, task.NAME_ as name ,null as pkid,pro.BUSINESS_KEY_ as caseCode, pro.PROC_INST_ID_ as instCode, task.CREATE_TIME_ as createTime, ilink.user_id_ as candidateId, task.ID_ as taskId,task.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDfKey_OLD,tca.pkid as caseId,b.PROPERTY_ADDR as propertyAddr ,tca.CTM_CODE as CTM_CODE,wfe.WFE_NAME,b.AGENT_NAME,b.AGENT_PHONE,b.GRP_NAME from sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK task left join sctrans.ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK ilink on task.ID_=ilink.TASK_ID_ left join sctrans.ACT_HI_PROCINST pro on task.PROC_INST_ID_=pro.PROC_INST_ID_ left join sctrans.t_to_case as tca on pro.BUSINESS_KEY_ =tca.case_code left join sctrans.v_case_list_base b on b.case_code = pro.BUSINESS_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON tca.ORG_ID=org.id left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on pro.BUSINESS_KEY_=wfe.WFE_CODE where task.ASSIGNEE_ is null and ilink.TYPE_='participant'
<if test="userServiceJobCode != 'COXXGLY' "> <ifNotNull mOrgId> and (ilink.user_id_=#candidateId# or tca.org_id=#mOrgId#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull managerFlag> and ilink.user_id_=#candidateId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull groupParentID> and org.parent_id=#groupParentID# </ifNotNull> </if> union SELECT t.groupName,t.groupParentID,t.groupParentName,t.name,t.pkid, t.caseCode,t.instCode,t.createTime,t.candidateId,t.taskId, t.taskDfKey_OLD,t.caseId,t.propertyAddr,t.CTM_CODE,t.WFE_NAME,t.AGENT_NAME,t.AGENT_PHONE,t.GRP_NAME FROM (SELECT org.org_name groupName,(SELECT org_parent.ID FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG org_parent WHERE org_parent.id=org.parent_id) groupParentID,(SELECT org_parent.org_name FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG org_parent WHERE org_parent.id=org.parent_id) groupParentName, ut.name as name,ut.pkid,ut.case_Code as caseCode, ut.inst_Code as instCode, ut.CREATE_TIME as createTime, ut.candidate_Id as candidateId, ut.task_Id as taskId ,ut.TASK_DEFINATION_KEY as taskDfKey_OLD,tca.pkid as caseId,b.PROPERTY_ADDR as propertyAddr ,tca.CTM_CODE as CTM_CODE,wfe.WFE_NAME,b.AGENT_NAME,b.AGENT_PHONE,b.GRP_NAME,ut.IS_DELETE,tca.org_id from sctrans.T_TO_UNLOCATED_TASK as ut left join sctrans.t_to_case as tca on ut.case_code =tca.case_code INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW AS tw ON ut.INST_CODE = tw.INST_CODE left join sctrans.sys_job j on ut.task_Job_Code = j.job_code left join sctrans.v_case_list_base b on b.case_code = ut.case_code left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON tca.ORG_ID=org.id left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on tw.BUSINESS_KEY=wfe.WFE_CODE) t where t.IS_DELETE='0' <if test="userServiceJobCode != 'COXXGLY' "> <ifNotNull groupParentID> and t.groupParentID=#groupParentID# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull mOrgId> and (t.candidateId=#candidateId# or t.org_id=#mOrgId#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull managerFlag> and t.candidateId=#candidateId# </ifNotNull> </if> ) as tt where 1=1
